T02D1549:196b-1: su kla badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha nam /
T02D1549:196b-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs //
T02D1549:196b-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1549:196b-5: dang po re zhig ae wam gi dbus su pam
T02D1549:196b-6: yig las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma'i lte ba la
T02D1549:196b-7: / aam yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D1549:197a-1: dkar po yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das
T02D1549:197a-2: ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sku mdog dkar mo
T02D1549:197a-3: // gcer bu rgyan med pa skra grol ba /
T02D1549:197a-6: phyag g-yon pa kha tv'am ga dang thod pa thogs pa /
T02D1549:197a-7: g-yas pas rdo rje tho ba thogs pa /
T02D1549:197a-8: zhabs gcig bteg pas brgya byin dang changs pa mnan pa /
T02D1549:197a-9: zhabs gcig gi 'og tu 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan mnan pa /
T02D1549:197a-10: zhal las rtag tu bdud rtsi 'phyang ba /
T02D1549:197a-11: spyan gsum pa spyan rtsa dmar zhing zlum pa /
T02D1549:197a-13: dpral ba'i mdzod spur khro gnyer dang ldan pa /
T02D1549:197a-15: shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs can /
T02D1549:197a-16: dur khrod la sogs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1549:197a-19: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
T02D1549:197a-21: badzra bee ro tsa n'i h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02D1549:197a-24: aom badzra d'a ki n'i hr'i: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1549:197a-26: aom badzra yo gi n'i h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1549:197a-29: de bzhin du gtor ma'i sngags ni /
T02D1549:197a-30: aom badzra yo gi n'i ai mam ba lim grihna
T02D1549:197a-31: grihna ru ru kha kha kha kha phem phem phem
T02D1549:197a-32: phem aa aa aa aa ma ma siddhi pra yatstsha
T02D1549:197a-34: tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la nges par mchod pa dang /
T02D1549:197a-36: rgyal po aindra bhu ti'i gzhung rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
